metadata.title: CVE-2024-33899 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: RARLAB WinRAR before 7.00, on Linux and UNIX platforms, allows attackers tospoof the screen output, or cause a denial of service, via ANSI escapesequences.

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
